title: HDFC bank raises FD rates for 35 and 55 months
description: HDFC Bank raises fixed deposit rates for 35 and 55 month tenures, offering 7.35% and 7.4% interest respectively. Senior citizens will receive 7.85% and 7.9% rates. CEO expresses dissatisfaction with Q1 deposit figures, focusing on deposit growth amid faster advances. RBI flags credit-deposit gap as sector concern. CEO Jagdishan aims to address this, emphasising deposit growth in Q1FY25 earnings call.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
